name: Team Dystopia's World (Executable Files)
description:
Art 107 - Section 01 -- (SPRING 2021)
Team Dystopia - Final Virtual World

--THE TEAM---
Matthew DeWitt - Lead Unity Developer
Richard Nubla - Lead Designer
Mary Dominguez - Project Producer
Almarie Mercado - Lead Interactive Designer

---STORY---
"Humans have been mistreating the Earth for too long and robots/A.I technology have united with the planet to fight back against the humans who mistreat the Earth. The leader of the robots has the power through A.I. capabilities to imbue nature with technological abilities. Thus, nature is able to fight back with robots against the humans to preserve its existence. For example, this villain gives trees the ability to make blades out of their leaves; flowers to spout explosives from their pollen; and water can electrify itself. The way we treat the planet poses a threat to the existence of the planet and in turn threatens the existence of ourselves as humans. The planet and robots/A.I. decide to take their fate into their own hands by going to war against human beings. The outcome of such war is visible through the final scene; Did the humans win? Or did the robots?"

---NOTES---

CONTROLS:
W, A, S, D - Move around
MOUSE - Look around
SHIFT - Sprint
CTRL - Crouch
SPACEBAR - Jump

*** (to exit application, fall off our map, then click on "back to 'reality'"). ***
